item.title: How can i
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

How can i make a shop that works with points?
I already make dnpoints(donator points) but i dont know how i can buy items from shop with them,like assault shop.I tried to make a copy of assault shop but i cant find the code were says something like this:
if(dnpoints >= 20) {
addItem(35, 1);
}
or something like thatâ€¦
Please reply.

For noobs
Befor a post i already use search button.

Read full topic
